column4: i started with ubuntu, then tried different lighter WM's because of my laptop and found that i enjoyed a minimalistic WM when using linux. I got so much more use out of my system and it looked good as hell
I use karmic with fvwm. 'Cos I've always used it and there are no panels...
i love have no panels too, i got into xmonad for a while, using rxvt 256 color terminal. it looked beautiful
